author: GREG THOMPSON THE NEWS-ENTERPRISE
title: St. James Catholic School presents annual Passion Play | Local News | thenewsenterprise.com
text: The messianic bloodline runs deep in the family of Wyatt Shepherd. The eighth-grade student at St. James Catholic School is the third male in his family to play the role of Jesus in the annual Passion play that was held Thursday at St. James Catholic Church in Elizabethtown. kAm%H@ 3C@E96CD 367@C6 9:> 2=D@ A=2J65 E96 C@=6 @7 y6DFD] tG2?[ `e[ H2D y6DFD EH@ J62CD 28@ 2?5 3C@E96C[ (:==:2>[ 96=5 E96 C@=6 23@FE 6:89E @C ?:?6 J62CD 28@]k^Am kAm“|J D:DE6C ,p>6=:2.
